title: Interactive Cognitive Games
summary: As an older adult, I want to access interactive cognitive games through voice commands so that I can engage my mind and maintain my cognitive abilities in a fun and challenging way.

title: Guided Physical Activity Challenges
summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want ALFRED to provide guided physical activity challenges so that I can engage in regular exercise that is suitable for my physical condition and receive motivation to stay active.

title: Progress Tracking for Activities
summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want to track my progress in physical and cognitive activities so that I can visualize my improvements and stay motivated.

title: Customizable Activity Scheduling
summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want to customize my activity schedules using voice commands so that I can manage my physical and cognitive activities according to my preferences and daily routines.

title: Social Interaction Through Activities
summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want to join group activities or challenges through voice commands so that I can stay engaged and connected with others while managing my physical and cognitive health.

title: Adaptive Activity Recommendations
summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want ALFRED to provide me with personalized recommendations for physical and cognitive activities so that I can stay engaged and maintain my health while ensuring my safety.
